Hire beekeepers to collect bees from nearby areas and bring them to the garden to pollinate plants.
Use pollination machines that use wind or vibration to transfer pollen from the male anthers to the female stigma of a flower.
Use a pollinator robot that uses a camera to identify the flowers and pollinate them using a small brush or drone.
Use pollination tubes that contain pollen and can be placed inside the flower to transfer pollen from the anther to the stigma.
Use a pollinator that uses a laser to cut through the flower's petals and transfer pollen from the anther to the stigma.
